item.description:
And now for something completely different...

So Maggie and I are headed for sun, sand, and, well, I anticipate an umbrella clad drink or two, this coming February, and thought we'd throw out the invite for any Meetup folks looking to get away.

Having done some research, we've decided to head to the Southern Caribbean for a 7 day cruise the first week of February. The Carnival Destiny leaves from San Juan, Puerto Rico on February 3rd at 10 pm, and returns on February 10th at 7 am.

(We'll get you back to work on Monday the 11th, not that you'll want to be there:-)

Each day will be spent in a port (there's no lazy sea time here, people!), including St. Thomas, Dominica, Barbados, St. Kitts, and the Dominica Republic (for a full 24 hours).

Please see the following link for more details on the itinerary and the costs.

http://www.carnival.c...

(If unsuccessful, the details can be accessed by searching: http://www.carnival.c...
for Southern Caribbean cruises in Feb 2008)

Please note that the costs are based on double occupancy. Single occupancy doubles the listed price.

Flights from Boston to San Juan are currently running around $350. Direct flights exist and take about 4 hours.

My goal is to provide info to anyone interested so we can link up those "stateroom-mates" that wish to join us. Check your calenders and your lives, and if you're up for a big winter getaway, RSVP away. I'm more than willing to serve as a liaison for getting folks paired up to keep costs down.

Booking of any flights and cruises will be completely up to you. I'm just a wee assistant organizer...travel agent is a hat yet to be donned:-)

Costs do climb and rooms do fill as we get closer to February...hence the intrusion into your inboxes now:-)

Please feel free to contact Lisa with all of the questions flooding your minds as we speak:-)
item.name: Southern Caribbean Cruise, Feb 3-10th
